timeline.bodyText: All other test methods start with lower-case so we should follow the same rule.
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Thank you! I was copy pasting in order to make no typos...
replies.author: the-bug

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if this is too much detail or not. I'll let @FroMage decide
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText:
Maybe we could go just with this explanation.
@DisabledOnNativeImage("Disabled in the native mode as there is no interaction with any endpoint")
replies.author: rsvoboda

replies.bodyText:
@rsvoboda This is valid. I described the reason for the test as there is no issue ticket linkable.
I do not know how much detail to put in there...
replies.author: the-bug

replies.bodyText: @FroMage Is this too much information in the comment?
replies.author: the-bug

replies.bodyText: It's long and not super useful, but it doesn't hurt so whatever :)
replies.author: FroMage

timeline.bodyText: This line confuses me: Thus this test is enabled in native mode. The test code runs the JVM and not native.
timeline.author: rsvoboda

replies.bodyText: Ohh... my fault... it should be disabled instead of enabled...
replies.author: the-bug

timeline.message:
extends comment for test

Now the bug is described and the test approach is explained

timeline.bodyText:
This test ensures that there something done that this does not happen

This doesn't seem a valid sentence.
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText:
"This test ensures that the attribute persistent is not generated when using Jackson"
Better?
replies.author: the-bug

replies.bodyText: I will adapt the PR next week. At the moment I do not have access to a my workstation...
replies.author: the-bug

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/integration-tests/hibernate-orm-panache/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/panache/PanacheFunctionalityTest.java b/integration-tests/hibernate-orm-panache/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/panache/PanacheFunctionalityTest.java
index ea4d3907fa..d73705f1ef 100644
--- a/integration-tests/hibernate-orm-panache/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/panache/PanacheFunctionalityTest.java
+++ b/integration-tests/hibernate-orm-panache/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/panache/PanacheFunctionalityTest.java

@@ -76,10 +76,10 @@ public class PanacheFunctionalityTest {
     }
 
     /**
-     * _PanacheEntityBase_ has the method _isPersistent_. This method is used by jackson to serialize the attribute *persistent*
-     * in the JSON which is not intended. This test ensures that there something done that this does not happen.
+     * _PanacheEntityBase_ has the method _isPersistent_. This method is used by Jackson to serialize the attribute *peristent*
+     * in the JSON which is not intended. This test ensures that the attribute *persistent* is not generated when using Jackson.
      * 
-     * This test does not interact with the quarkus application itself. It is just using the jackson ObjectMapper with a
+     * This test does not interact with the Quarkus application itself. It is just using the Jackson ObjectMapper with a
      * PanacheEntity. Thus this test is disabled in native mode. The test code runs the JVM and not native.
      */
     @DisabledOnNativeImage
